room_title: Escape room "Escape Your Nightmare" by Mind Games Clovis in Fresno
room_address: 30 W Shaw Ave, Suite 108 Clovis, CA 93612
room_description:
Your neighbor just stares at you as he pulls out of the driveway on his weekly errand. You know nothing about the guy except he’s creepy. You’re certain you’ve heard screams coming from his house, late at night. Your family says it’s just the sound of wildlife scavenging and hunting near your suburban neighborhood. You aren’t convinced.
Sneak into John Alvan’s house at 4350 Elm Street and see what he’s been up to. He better not catch you there, or you’ll learn what nightmares are really made of.
